### Problem 17.1
```{r}
NCHS %>%
  na.omit() %>%
  nrow()

CompleteCases <-
  NCHS %>%
  select(diabetic, weight, age, bmi, chol, smoker) %>%
  na.omit()

CompleteCases %>%
  nrow()
```

```{r}
mod1 <- party::ctree(
  diabetic ~ weight + chol,
  data=CompleteCases) 
plot(mod1, type="simple")
```
